verses.name: Jeremiah 22:16
verses.text: He judged the cause of the poor and needy; then it was well with him: was not this to know me? saith the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 22:17
verses.text: But thine eyes and thine heart are not but for thy covetousness, and for to shed innocent blood, and for oppression, and for violence, to do it.

verses.name: Jeremiah 22:18
verses.text: Therefore thus saith the Lord concerning Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah; They shall not lament for him, saying, Ah my brother! or, Ah sister! they shall not lament for him, saying, Ah lord! or, Ah his glory!
